g:HTMLPanel.div: DISCIPLINE Discipline is a required part for a human to live in any society. Rules must be clear and oriented according to the standards. Children should have guidance during play and education moments. They must have an external authority that make them follow the rules without any abuse or hard authority. We assume that it is the responsibility of the care takers that all these points are follow. Of course, it could happen that the children do not contribute or feel enthusiastic about their responsibilities in particular when there is a long history of bad habits.
